level.text: Each electronic solicitation shall comply with the requirements of this title and the District of Columbia Procurement Practices Reform Act of 2010, effective April 8, 2011 (D.C. Law 18-371; D.C. Official Code §§ 2-351.01, et seq. (2011 Supp.)), for the procurement method being utilized.

Source: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 10224 (October 29, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 1658 (March 4, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 6100 (July 22, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 7978, 7979 (September 9, 2011).
